website_summaries.verdict: Versatile and complete metal detection kit for users at all skill and experience levels. Expensive, but worth it in terms of time savings.
pros: Kit includes virtually every useful accessory available
Pin-pointer makes hole examinations much easier
Finds objects other detectors often miss
cons: Camo carrying bag is exceptionally large (50"), not comfortable or discreet
Included headphones are bulky and uncomfortable, not smaller in-ear pieces with an adapter

customer_reviews.title: Buy this instead of Ace 400.
customer_reviews.text: Machine, like any hobby, works as well as the user knows the machine. Greater use increases chances of finding goodies! I have found coins from 1885, silver rings, thimbles, and it lead me to many of bottle dumps by finding jar lids and other iron. 1700's bottles are now rescued from the truck muck track of the local islands. Great value, great fun, sturdy, waterproof with correct use. Always use coil cover.
customer_reviews.author: C. Kukowski

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect in every aspect. I'm a first time user and wanted to get a good machine and I have not been disappointed! Easy to use right out of the box, the pin pointer is fun and works great. I love the carry bag because it can hold everything. Definitely worth the money and have found plenty of coins and treasures! Favorite new hobby.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great unit , get ya one
customer_reviews.text: Great product, light weight easy to use, pin pointer is a great add to this package. I own a Whites detector as well however this Garrett AT Pro is my new favorite, 1st time out found a handful of newer coins at a park I had been thru with the other detector, I would recommend this unit
customer_reviews.author: Kim P.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful choice!
customer_reviews.text: New to metal detecting. Have been out a few times since I got this detector, have used it in the water and on land and love it!! Found a few dollars in coins and several interesting items. Bought the 5x8 coil and have been using it - haven't used the stock coil yet. The pointer is awesome! The padded detector bag is great too - lots of storage! Headphones work well. Look forward to getting some waterproof ones. Video is very helpful. Would recommend to anyone looking for a good all terrain detector!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn M

customer_reviews.title: Extraordinary machine!!
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding metal detector!! With my old detector, it took me almost 3 years to find about 3 silver coins and with this detector it only took me 2 months to find 8 silver coins in the same area... very pleased with this buy and I love its waterproof ability for awesome river detecting!!
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Better than the Ace 400 and the GTi2500.
customer_reviews.text: This AT Pro is a lot better than the Ace 400 and the GTi2500 as it found a bunch of things the other two missed. A lot of fun using and very smooth in using, unlike the GTi2500 which is heavy and unbalanced.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: I got this for my retirement days of treasure hunting
customer_reviews.text: I have not got around to using it yet so I need to find a local metal detector club
customer_reviews.author: Paul N.

customer_reviews.title: A winner by many pros in detectors.
customer_reviews.text: The Garrett AT Pro has been a long standing winner when it comes to top of the line "mid-level" priced metal detector. One can't go wrong with this choice.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Dowhy

customer_reviews.title: Detector is awesome. The pro pointer was defective
customer_reviews.text: Detector is awesome. The pro pointer was defective. Sent it back to be repaired and haven't gotten it back yet. Should be back this week Anxiously waiting.
customer_reviews.author: Wesley A Cooper

customer_reviews.title: and a great deal. The Pin Pointer started acting funky after ...
customer_reviews.text: This bundle was exactly as advertised. No surprises at all, and a great deal. The Pin Pointer started acting funky after about an hour of use, but after an investigation I discovered that the reason was the battery was about dead. Replaced it and it's been working fine since. If your thinking about metal detecting, this includes everything you need to get started in one box. I'm very happy with this.
customer_reviews.author: James S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic machine. First time user. Great instruction video and booklet. Comes with everything needed for beginner on up.
customer_reviews.author: Bill W

customer_reviews.title: The detector does not fit easily in the carrying case...could have been designed better, if needed at all.
customer_reviews.text: It does everything advertised...worked great my first time out. I can't wait to use it more extensively in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Fran H. Price

customer_reviews.title: Metal detector
customer_reviews.text: My son has used it almost every day to dig up my yard.. he really likes it and it works well.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: AT Pro Garrett
customer_reviews.text: This is a great metal detector. You're ready to go detecting right ut of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: at pro is great. its just the pin pointer warn out in ...
customer_reviews.text: at pro is great. its just the pin pointer warn out in 6 months, the plastic tip big hole in it,the cover for coil breaks easy,the pouch is ripping.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great package.
customer_reviews.text: Everything checks out. The DVDs has good information that is understandable. So far I've been able to find small items and the tool is very ueful. The package came with the Garrett pointer and it has been very helpful as I dig for items that are below 4".
customer_reviews.author: David Phelps

customer_reviews.title: I would have gave it a 5 star but the ...
customer_reviews.text: I would have gave it a 5 star but the pinpointer won't beep anymore after 4 months it just vibrates
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Great deal an detector easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing, easy to use an has just about everything you need to start hunting. I keep ti in my truck all the time, just in case.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AT Pro is an awesome machine. I would recommend this detector to anyone ...
customer_reviews.text: AT Pro is an awesome machine. I would recommend this detector to anyone that is looking to get in to the hoddy!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel C. Pack

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: The AT pro is as good as they come. Great coin hunting beach-combing machine. My wife uses this and likes the light weight. The new waterproof pinpointer has exceeded my expectations and I will be getting another one. It is fabulous working around Lake Tahoe (fresh water, lots of iron sand) and getting dropped in the water has not bothered it at all. Overall, a great combo......
customer_reviews.author: Heather H.

customer_reviews.title: and recommend to others
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery, exactly as presented. Would use this vendor again, and recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: scott h nagy

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Awesome machine! A little glitchy in water but overall great.
customer_reviews.author: daniel mceleney

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!!!
customer_reviews.text: This detector is great! After 5 minutes of very basic assembly I was in my backyard finding coins from the early 1900s. The distinct tones differentiate the types of metal you are near. The pinpointed makes it very easy to sort through the dirt plug and the hole you dig. Very pleased and I highly recommend this kit.
customer_reviews.author: james ganley

customer_reviews.title: Buy this one if you don't know anything about metal detectors but want to try one.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first unit. An expert buddy sold his $1600 brand and bought one of these after I got mine and he's says this one is better.
customer_reviews.author: Fight for Freedom

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Bought this as a Christmas gift for ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Bought this as a Christmas gift for my 15 yr old son and he loves it. Its easy to use and he's already found some items with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great package deal
customer_reviews.text: Can definitely find a needle in a hay stack with the Garrett AT Pro, Great package deal!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to get the best I could without spending too much
customer_reviews.text: My first metal detector. I got my son a Garrett 250 and he loves it, I wanted to get the best I could without spending too much. Have used it several times and find a lot of bottle tops.. My son will use his and won't catch everything I do. Can't wait to find a quality area to search.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this package a couple days ago and have already found some coins.......
customer_reviews.author: TheNipplesOfGod

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Everything is great except the sheath for the hand spade. It has fallen apart during the first use.
customer_reviews.author: dean may

customer_reviews.title: Nice kit
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad kit for the first timer, used this about 4 times now and found a few things but with most metal detecting you get a lot of junk. I like the pinpointer nicely made and I like that this unit is waterproof and that I tested and no issues. I do wish the case was black and didn't loom ore like a rifle case than a case for a metal detector, lol. I will see about finding something else a bit more less threatening if you get stopped on the road :-).
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my son and he loves it! Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Vickie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great unit with a good DVR to show how it works...
customer_reviews.author: twinbonanza

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Loving it these are some of my very first finds coins right away
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Metal Detector
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves loves this!! Now im jealous and want one myself....So maybe he will get me one for Christmas!! Great Metal Detector....One of the best!
customer_reviews.author: Mauri A Wade

customer_reviews.title: love love love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I love ❤ my metal detector! Ive always wanted one and I got a very good deal with the bundle. The shipment came in a timely manner. The shipping was free with my amazon prime membership. I would recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: amy robbins

customer_reviews.title: AT PRO NOT WORKING
customer_reviews.text: Just got my AT PRO . This detector dose not work.waited a while before ordering watched tons of reviews and Garrett AT PRO training videos. Opened the box, assembled, took outside to my test plot. nothing it turns on it will switch modes just no detecting of any metal.picked up the phone and called Garrett customer service, after a few minutes and a few testing procedures they told me they would overnight me a new AT PRO.WE WILL SEE! have a ace 350 and love it.. GREAT DETECTOR. . Very disappointed that I received a bad detector but so far the customer service is OUTSTANDING.
customer_reviews.author: caryl panzanaro

customer_reviews.title: Awsome is what I have to say about the AT ...
customer_reviews.text: Awsome is what I have to say about the AT Pro. Spent only 15mins in my yard and found stuff. Can't wait to hit the beach.
customer_reviews.author: Cal

product_meta.title: Garrett at Pro Metal Detector Special with Pro Pointer at PinPointer, Bag, Pouch, Hat, Cover and Digging Knife
product_meta.description: Highly Recommended for - Coin Hunting, Jewelry Hunting, Relic Hunting, Cache Hunting, Prospecting, Ghost Town Hunting, Competition Events, Beach/Fresh Water Hunting WATERPROOF TO 10 FEET OR 3 METERS AT Pro is Garrett’s all-new, all-terrain, all-treasure,deep-seeking, professional treasure hunter’s detector! This all-terrain detector offers new and exclusive Garrett technology that makes it ideal for hunting coins, relics, caches, jewelry, and even gold nuggets. Select from either Standard or Professional search modes with enhanced audio features. The AT Pro is engineered with a waterproof housing and connectors to protect in dusty, muddy, wet and humid environments. The AT Pro can be immersed in water to a 10-foot depth (maximum) to search in and along shorelines, rivers, piers, docks or swimming holes, as well as all land sites from mountains to dry deserts. AT (All-Terrain) can be used anywhere on land or in water.
feature_bullets: Includes Garrett AT PRO Metal Detector, Pro Pointer AT Waterproof PinPointer, Garrett 8.5" x 11" DD Coil Cover, Garrett Mastersound Headphones, Garrett Diggers Pouch, Garrett Edge Digger, Garrett Digital Garrett Camouflage Soft Case

Pro Mode Audio: Proportional Audio and Tone Roll Audio features allow the user to hear characteristics of a target as they would in a True All-Metal Mode. High-Res Iron Discrimination: Use touchpads to set iron discrimination in one of 40 levels for precise ability to separate good targets from trash.

Digital Target ID: 0 to 99 Target ID scale offers increased ability to distinguish one target's conductivity from another. Iron Audio: Allows the user to hear discriminated iron and to alter the detector's mid-tone signal's range

Fast Recovery Speed: Allows greater ability to pick out good targets amongst trash All Terrain Versatility: Weatherproof housing designed for dusty, humid or wet environments; unit can be submerged to a maximum 10-foot depth. 15 kHz frequency: improved detection of small targets, gold nuggets, jewelry

Ground Balance: automatic and manually adjustable for improved performance Graphic Target Analyzer (GTA): identifies target's conductivity Continuous Coin Depth Indicator: to determine target depth Battery Condition Indicator: shows battery life continually

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars72 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
